Yashwanth Rao Gujja

Salesforce Developer | Photographer | Painter

Email: yashwanthgujja95@gmail.com | Phone: +1 (984) 584-8444

Hello! I'm Yashwanth, a driven and innovative Computer Science Master's graduate from Missouri University of Science & Technology, with a vibrant background in Salesforce development, and a passion for data science and machine learning.

Starting my journey with a Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering from Kakatiya University, I've always been keen on leveraging technology to solve complex problems and enhance user experiences. My professional path has led me through roles at esteemed organizations like Deloitte USI and General Electric, where I've not only honed my technical skills but also developed a keen understanding of business processes and user needs.

What I Bring to the Table:

Salesforce Excellence: Certified in Platform Developer I & II and Salesforce Administration, I've contributed to groundbreaking projects that optimized performance and user engagement through Lightning Web Components (LWC), complex business process automation, and cross-application integrations.

Team Leadership & Mentorship: Proven ability in mentoring junior developers, improving productivity by 25%, and fostering an environment of learning and growth.

Agile Methodology: Adept at Scrum Agile practices, ensuring efficient and iterative development cycles that meet project objectives and timelines.

Data Science Enthusiast: Engaged in advanced coursework and projects involving machine learning, computer vision, and data normalization, showcasing my commitment to staying at the forefront of technology.

Technical Toolbox: Proficient in Python, Java, JavaScript, SQL, and cloud technologies, alongside specialized skills in Salesforce (Apex, Visual Force, CRM Analytics), data tools (Pandas, NumPy), and data visualization (Tableau, Matplotlib).

I am eager to explore full-time opportunities where I can contribute my diverse skill set, drive innovation, and grow alongside a team that values creativity and forward-thinking.
